1: עָלָ֥ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>is come up</n> מֵפִ֛יץ <sup>6327 </sup> <n>He that dasheth in pieces</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> פָּנַ֖יִךְ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before thy face</n> נָצ֣וֹר <sup>5341 </sup> <n>keep</n> מְצֻרָ֑ה <sup>4694 </sup> <n>the munition</n> צַפֵּה־ <sup>6822 </sup> <n>watch</n> דֶ֙רֶךְ֙ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>the way</n> חַזֵּ֣ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>strong</n> מָתְנַ֔יִם <sup>4975 </sup> <n>make [thy] loins</n> אַמֵּ֥ץ <sup>553 </sup> <n>fortify</n> כֹּ֖חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>[thy] power</n> מְאֹֽד׃ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>mightily</n>
2: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>though</n> שָׁ֤ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>hath turned away</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>For the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גְּא֣וֹן <sup>1347 </sup> <n>the excellency</n> יַעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> כִּגְא֖וֹן <sup>1347 </sup> <n>as the excellency</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>though</n> בְקָקוּם֙ <sup>1238 </sup> <n>for the emptiers</n> בֹּֽקְקִ֔ים <sup>1238 </sup> <n>have emptied them out</n> וּזְמֹרֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>2156 </sup> <n>their vine branches</n> שִׁחֵֽתוּ׃ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>and marred</n>
3: מָגֵ֨ן <sup>4043 </sup> <n>The shield</n> גִּבֹּרֵ֜יהוּ <sup>1368 </sup> <n>of his mighty men</n> מְאָדָּ֗ם <sup>119 </sup> <n>is made red</n> אַנְשֵׁי־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>the warriors</n> חַ֙יִל֙ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>the valiant</n> מְתֻלָּעִ֔ים <sup>8529 </sup> <n>[are] in scarlet</n> בְּאֵשׁ־ <sup>784 </sup> <n>[shall be] with flaming</n> פְּלָד֥וֹת <sup>6393 </sup> <n>torches</n> הָרֶ֖כֶב <sup>7393 </sup> <n>the chariots</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> הֲכִינ֑וֹ <sup>3559 </sup> <n>of his preparation</n> וְהַבְּרֹשִׁ֖ים <sup>1265 </sup> <n>and the fir trees</n> הָרְעָֽלוּ׃ <sup>7477 </sup> <n>shall be terribly shaken</n>
4: בַּֽחוּצוֹת֙ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>in the streets</n> יִתְהוֹלְל֣וּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>shall rage</n> הָרֶ֔כֶב <sup>7393 </sup> <n>The chariots</n> יִֽשְׁתַּקְשְׁק֖וּן <sup>8264 </sup> <n>they shall justle one against another</n> בָּרְחֹב֑וֹת <sup>7339 </sup> <n>in the broad ways</n> מַרְאֵיהֶן֙ <sup>4758 </sup> <n>they shall seem</n> כַּלַּפִּידִ֔ם <sup>3940 </sup> <n>like torches</n> כַּבְּרָקִ֖ים <sup>1300 </sup> <n>like the lightnings</n> יְרוֹצֵֽצוּ׃ <sup>7323 </sup> <n>they shall run</n>
5: יִזְכֹּר֙ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>He shall recount</n> אַדִּירָ֔יו <sup>117 </sup> <n>his worthies</n> יִכָּשְׁל֖וּ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>they shall stumble</n> [בַהֲלִכֹותָם כ] (בַּהֲלִֽיכָתָ֑ם <sup>1979 </sup> <n>company</n> ק) יְמַֽהֲרוּ֙ <sup>4116 </sup> <n>they shall make haste</n> חֽוֹמָתָ֔הּ <sup>2346 </sup> <n>to the wall</n> וְהֻכַ֖ן <sup>3559 </sup> <n>shall be prepared</n> הַסֹּכֵֽךְ׃ <sup>5526 </sup> <n>thereof and the defence</n>
6: שַׁעֲרֵ֥י <sup>8179 </sup> <n>The gates</n> הַנְּהָר֖וֹת <sup>5104 </sup> <n>of the rivers</n> נִפְתָּ֑חוּ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>shall be opened</n> וְהַֽהֵיכָ֖ל <sup>1964 </sup> <n>and the palace</n> נָמֽוֹג׃ <sup>4127 </sup> <n>shall be dissolved</n>
7: וְהֻצַּ֖ב <sup>5324 </sup> <n>And Huzzab</n> גֻּלְּתָ֣ה <sup>1540 </sup> <n>shall be led away captive</n> הֹֽעֲלָ֑תָה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>she shall be brought up</n> וְאַמְהֹתֶ֗יהָ <sup>519 </sup> <n>and her maids</n> מְנַֽהֲגוֹת֙ <sup>5090 </sup> <n>shall lead</n> כְּק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>[her] as with the voice</n> יוֹנִ֔ים <sup>3123 </sup> <n>of doves</n> מְתֹפְפֹ֖ת <sup>8608 </sup> <n>tabering</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> לִבְבֵהֶֽן׃ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>upon their breasts</n>
8: וְנִינְוֵ֥ה <sup>5210 </sup> <n>But Nineveh</n> כִבְרֵֽכַת־ <sup>1295 </sup> <n>like a pool</n> מַ֖יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>of water</n> מִ֣ימֵי <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[is] of old</n> הִ֑יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְהֵ֣מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> נָסִ֔ים <sup>5127 </sup> <n>yet they shall flee away</n> עִמְד֥וּ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>Stand</n> עֲמֹ֖דוּ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>stand</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> מַפְנֶֽה׃ <sup>6437 </sup> <n>[shall they cry] but none shall look back</n>
9: בֹּ֥זּוּ <sup>962 </sup> <n>Take ye the spoil</n> כֶ֖סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>of silver</n> בֹּ֣זּוּ <sup>962 </sup> <n>take the spoil</n> זָהָ֑ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>of gold</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> קֵ֙צֶה֙ <sup>7097 </sup> <n>for [there is] none end</n> לַתְּכוּנָ֔ה <sup>8498 </sup> <n>of the store</n> כָּבֹ֕ד <sup>3519 </sup> <n>[and] glory</n> מִכֹּ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> כְּלִ֥י <sup>3627 </sup> <n>furniture</n> חֶמְדָּֽה׃ <sup>2532 </sup> <n>out of all the pleasant</n>
10: בּוּקָ֥ה <sup>950 </sup> <n>She is empty</n> וּמְבוּקָ֖ה <sup>4003 </sup> <n>and void</n> וּמְבֻלָּקָ֑ה <sup>1110 </sup> <n>and waste</n> וְלֵ֨ב <sup>3820 </sup> <n>and the heart</n> נָמֵ֜ס <sup>4549 </sup> <n>melteth</n> וּפִ֣ק <sup>6375 </sup> <n>smite together</n> בִּרְכַּ֗יִם <sup>1290 </sup> <n>and the knees</n> וְחַלְחָלָה֙ <sup>2479 </sup> <n>and much pain</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>the whole</n> מָתְנַ֔יִם <sup>4975 </sup> <n>[is] in all loins</n> וּפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>and the faces</n> כֻלָּ֖ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> קִבְּצ֥וּ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>of them all gather</n> פָארֽוּר׃ <sup>6289 </sup> <n>blackness</n>
11: אַיֵּה֙ <sup>346 </sup> <n>Where</n> מְע֣וֹן <sup>4583 </sup> <n>Where [is] the dwelling</n> אֲרָי֔וֹת <sup>738 </sup> <n>of the lions</n> וּמִרְעֶ֥ה <sup>4829 </sup> <n>and the feedingplace</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לַכְּפִרִ֑ים <sup>3715 </sup> <n>of the young lions</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> הָלַךְ֩ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>walked</n> אַרְיֵ֨ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>where the lion</n> לָבִ֥יא <sup>3833 </sup> <n>[even] the old lion</n> שָׁ֛ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> גּ֥וּר <sup>1482 </sup> <n>whelp</n> אַרְיֵ֖ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>[and] the lion's</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>nothing</n> מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <sup>2729 </sup> <n>and none made [them] afraid</n>
12: אַרְיֵ֤ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>The lion</n> טֹרֵף֙ <sup>2963 </sup> <n>did tear in pieces</n> בְּדֵ֣י <sup>1767 </sup> <n>enough</n> גֹֽרוֹתָ֔יו <sup>1484 </sup> <n>for his whelps</n> וּמְחַנֵּ֖ק <sup>2614 </sup> <n>and strangled</n> לְלִבְאֹתָ֑יו <sup>3833 </sup> <n>for his lionesses</n> וַיְמַלֵּא־ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>and filled</n> טֶ֣רֶף <sup>2964 </sup> <n>with prey</n> חֹרָ֔יו <sup>2356 </sup> <n>his holes</n> וּמְעֹֽנֹתָ֖יו <sup>4585 </sup> <n>and his dens</n> טְרֵפָֽה׃ <sup>2966 </sup> <n>with ravin</n>
13: הִנְנִ֣י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> אֵלַ֗יִךְ <sup>413 </sup> <n>I am against</n> נְאֻם֙ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>Behold I [am] against thee saith</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> צְבָא֔וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> וְהִבְעַרְתִּ֤י <sup>1197 </sup> <n>and I will burn</n> בֶֽעָשָׁן֙ <sup>6227 </sup> <n>in the smoke</n> רִכְבָּ֔הּ <sup>7393 </sup> <n>her chariots</n> וּכְפִירַ֖יִךְ <sup>3715 </sup> <n>thy young lions</n> תֹּ֣אכַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall devour</n> חָ֑רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>and the sword</n> וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <sup>3772 </sup> <n>and I will cut off</n> מֵאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>from the earth</n> טַרְפֵּ֔ךְ <sup>2964 </sup> <n>thy prey</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and no</n> יִשָּׁמַ֥ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>shall no more be heard</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> ק֥וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>and the voice</n> מַלְאָכֵֽכֵה׃ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>of thy messengers</n> ס
